headline: Senate candidate Dr. Oz to host Greensburg event
author: Megan Tomasic
sentences: During the event, guests will have the opportunity to meet Oz and ask him questions about important issues related to his candidacy.

He's not alone in an ultra-wealthy GOP field
The event begins at 1 p.m. at Giannilli’s II, located at 4816 Route 30 in Greensburg.
Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running for Pennsylvania’s open U.S. Senate seat, is hosting a meet-and-greet Wednesday in Greensburg.
Reservations can be made by emailing jason@doctorozforsenate.com or by calling 610-674-0195.
• Mehmet Oz is spending millions on TV to boost his Senate campaign in Pennsylvania.
